publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3289 Pauline McNeill: Partick 150th Anniversaryâ€”That the Parliament notes the 150th anniversary of the burgh of Partick; sends its warmest greetings to its citizens present and past, and notes the rich history of Partick from fishing village outside Glasgow in 1652 to its crucial role in the development of the Clyde shipbuilding industry.
S1M-3289 Partick 150th Anniversary (lodged on 24 July 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3289 Partick 150th Anniversary (lodged on 24 July 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3289 Partick 150th Anniversary (lodged on 24 July 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3289 Partick 150th Anniversary (lodged on 24 July 2002) Karen Gillon*
S1M-3289 Partick 150th Anniversary (lodged on 24 July 2002) Ms Sandra White*
